drhutools 0.1.0

Reference

All functions

addLine

Shortcut for adding lines in a modelsummary table.

fitPage()

Shortcut for flextable to fit the MS Word output well.

gb_cols()

Function to extract colors as hex codes.

gb_pal()

Function to interpolate a gold & black color palette.

plotKS()

Packed ggplot2 function to present the empirical cumulative distribution functions

scale_color_gb()

Fill scale constructors for gold & black colors

scale_fill_gb()

Color scale constructors for gold & black colors

text_wrapper()

Function to wrap
